definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

pinyin: dian4 lan3 tiao2 zhi4 jie3 tiao2 qi4

sentences.english: It is a preferred addictive for preparing over-based marine cylinder oil.
sentences.chinese: 是调制高碱值船用汽缸油的首选添加剂。

sentences.english: The corresponding unwrapped phases are achieved by use of a lookup table method.
sentences.chinese: 并且应用查表法解包得到真实调制相位分布。

sentences.english: This effect is called self-phase modulation.
sentences.chinese: 这种效应叫做自相位调制。

sentences.english: Finally, the smoothing of BPSK modulation, and optimization of its performance are performed.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了平滑化BPSK调制，优化了性能。

sentences.english: Rosehip Seed Lip Balm Pure plant lip balm for chapped and dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 为干裂的唇部调制的植物性护唇膏。

sentences.english: You can make glue from flour and water.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用面粉和水调制糨糊。

sentences.english: Vibratory conditioning technology (VCT) was used in the routine electro-slag welding (ESW) for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次将振动调制工艺应用到常规电渣焊中。

sentences.english: The third part is "The human nature hypothesis and economic regulation law".
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是“人性假定与经济调制法”。

sentences.english: Line-array fiber-optic image bundles on the contrast transfer function;
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了线列光纤传像束的对比度调制传递函数。

sentences.english: Then dialin to the modem again.
sentences.chinese: 然后再次拨入调制解调器。

sentences.english: All-digital modulation is a hot field in modern communication systems.
sentences.chinese: 全数字调制技术是当前通信领域研究的一个热点问题。

sentences.english: This thesis first builded up the loss model of inverter with different modulation methods.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先建立了逆变器不同调制方式下的损耗模型。

sentences.english: The implemented wideband modulator is tested by the VSA(vector signal analyzer).
sentences.chinese: 利用矢量信号分析仪对调制器进行了测试。

sentences.english: In this paper, a modulation method for carrier channel with large capacity in optical fibre transmission is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了利用光纤传输大通路载波信号的调制方式。

sentences.english: And velocity bunching mechanism is a SAR inherent modulation.
sentences.chinese: 而速度聚束调制是SAR所特有的调制机理。

sentences.english: And velocity bunching mechanism is a SAR inherent modulation.
sentences.chinese: 而速度聚束调制是SAR所特有的调制机理。

definition: to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
to feed in/to load (raw material, supplies, fuel etc)/to supply/fortified (with added material)
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)
